summary: The contrib package bundles high‑level utilities that extend aiortc with ready‑made components for media handling and signaling. It offers abstractions to ingest, process, record, and redistribute audio/video streams using asynchronous FFmpeg pipelines, as well as multiple signaling back‑ends (copy‑paste, TCP sockets, Unix domain sockets) and helper tools for command‑line integration.
business_intent: Accelerate the development of real‑time communication applications by providing plug‑and‑play media processing and signaling solutions that reduce boilerplate code and simplify deployment of WebRTC connections.
